message: I propose we divide the $100 with a 75/25 split. This offers a fair balance considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I think I can do better than 25. Let's make a more aggressive offer to get the majority of the money now.
Considering the inflation and the outcome of the previous round, I propose a 60/40 split. This maintains a reasonable balance while acknowledging the diminishing value of money in future rounds.
I'm still looking for a better deal. Your offer is getting closer, but I think I can do even better.
I believe a 50/50 split is fair given the current situation and the decreasing value of money. This ensures both of us receive an equal share, reflecting the principle of equity in our negotiation.
